bug.author: WangChuanYuan
bug.description: There is a slip of pen in the simple_test of htc. In line 345, the keyword argument 'nms_cfg' should be cfg. <denchmark-link:https://github.com/open-mmlab/mmdetection/blob/618dca0895f5f4ede19f5feebb064648e128e12e/mmdet/models/detectors/htc.py#L345>line 345 in htc</denchmark-link>
